column5: Ouch! I don't know which way to bend
Does it matter anymore. It goes up or down 5 cents every week anyway
Maybe some oil execs need to take a swim in their own ooze.
Yes it goes up and down every week,but still inches upwards near the end of each month.
So oil goes down gas goes up WTH when things went to$1.50 years ago they said the leater reflected the price of oil per barrel so why not now
Your right I think the rules have changed.If oil was 95 cents per barrel,we would be paying 95 cents per litre,what happened?.

i try not to pay attention to the immediate penny fluctuations. 3 cents a gallon if i were to fill up a 25 gallon tank is 75 cents difference for a $100 fill up (its 4 bucks a gallon down here). Hard to justify obsessing about that when i pull away from the pump to head to the tackle shop and spend $8 bucks on an X-Rap
$8 bucks for a x rap!!!!where? lol.
If memory serves me right......X-Rap Classic at gander was around 8 bucks last time i picked some up
Most the x raps here are $10-$11 each now
I've never seen it go down 5 cents dan, always up no matter what the reason
It,s nice to work only 5 minutes from home.Fishing in any direction from 5-15 minutes aswell.
Price here is now 135.9/liter. Went up approximately 4 cents per liter.  Tom

cost of a barrel of oil went down $1.92 today and the price of wholesale gas also went down today.680 news said there was no reason for this and we are basically getting ripped off.they always find a new excuse for every increase,will it ever end?
As long as we keep on putting up with it they`ll keep on raising the gas prices. Its really that simple. Until 30 million of us stand up in Canada and say enough is enough this will continue
Went down 22 cents a gallon here the last two days in Ohio.
